body:
When you're in the middle of destroying solo q (7 and 0 on trynd), when all of the sudden, you dc. When attempting to re-connect you're told you can't, over and over again the same message, that you have no internet connection... As you're in a call with other people. 

I'm legitimately wondering when this will end................

replies.body: Just had the same thing happen to me in my last game... I hate losing LP for no reason.

That really sucks, sorry that happened.  :(  I wasn't able to see any issues on our side that would have caused this, though, an ISP or local hiccup could be the culprit.  If this is still happening, definitely run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot before queuing for another game.  I hope that helps!
